name: reflaxe-elixir
description: Haxe to Elixir compilation target using Reflaxe with Mix integration. Uses npm/lix for Haxe compiler development, mix for Elixir runtime testing.
author: fullofcaffeine

scripts.build: echo 'Reflaxe.Elixir is a compiler - no build step needed'
scripts.test: scripts/test-chunks.sh --parallel 8 --chunk-deadline 900 --timeout 120 && npm run test:generator && npm run test:elixir-validate && npm run test:mix
scripts.test:sequential: make -C test -j1 && npm run test:elixir-validate && npm run test:generator && npm run test:mix
scripts.test:quick: bash scripts/test-chunks.sh --parallel 8 --chunk-deadline 900 --timeout 120 --categories core,stdlib,regression && bash test/validate_elixir.sh test/snapshot/core test/snapshot/stdlib test/snapshot/regression
scripts.test:with-validation: make -C test -j8 test-with-validation && npm run test:mix
scripts.test:mix: mix local.hex --force && mix local.rebar --force && MIX_ENV=test mix deps.get && MIX_ENV=test mix deps.compile && MIX_ENV=test mix test --max-cases 1 --timeout 120000
scripts.test:mix-fast: mix local.hex --force && mix local.rebar --force && MIX_ENV=test mix deps.get && MIX_ENV=test mix deps.compile && MIX_ENV=test mix test --stale --max-cases 1 --timeout 60000
scripts.test:mix-parallel: mix local.hex --force && mix local.rebar --force && MIX_ENV=test mix deps.get && MIX_ENV=test mix deps.compile && MIX_ENV=test mix test --max-cases 4 --timeout 120000
scripts.test:examples: bash -lc 'HAXE_BIN=${HAXE_BIN:-haxe}; for dir in examples/*/; do echo "Testing $dir"; if [ -f "$dir/compile-all.hxml" ]; then (cd "$dir" && $HAXE_BIN compile-all.hxml) || exit 1; elif [ -f "$dir/build.hxml" ]; then (cd "$dir" && $HAXE_BIN build.hxml) || exit 1; fi; done'
scripts.test:verify: npm run test:core && echo 'Core functionality verified âœ…'
scripts.clean:generated: bash -c 'echo "Cleaning compiler-generated files..."; for dir in examples/*/lib test/snapshot/*/out test/snapshot/*/intended; do if [ -f "$dir/_GeneratedFiles.json" ]; then echo "Processing $dir"; (cd "$dir" && jq -r ".filesGenerated[]" _GeneratedFiles.json 2>/dev/null | while read -r file; do if [ -f "$file" ]; then echo "  Removing: $file"; rm "$file"; fi; done); elif [ -d "$dir" ]; then echo "Cleaning $dir (no manifest)"; find "$dir" -name "*.ex" -type f -delete 2>/dev/null; fi; done; echo "âœ“ Cleaned all compiler-generated files"'
scripts.setup: lix scope create && lix install haxelib:reflaxe
scripts.ci:guards: npm run guard:names && npm run guard:numeric && npm run guard:sloppy-pattern-numeric && npm run guard:no-elixir-in-app && npm run guard:no-dynamic && npm run guard:no-disabled-debug && npm run guard:filesize && npm run guard:docs-links && echo 'Guards passed'
